content: this is a civil case being heard in the vilnius city district court the applicant and the defendant are involved in a divorce case regarding the division of matrimonial property the court has decided that the applicant will receive half of the house and the defendant will receive the other half the applicant is also responsible for the obligations of a credit agreement the court has ordered the applicant to pay the defendant compensation for the defendants greater share of movable property additionally the defendant has been ordered to pay the applicant a sum of money from the savings accumulated in the applicants account the legal text discusses two articles in the civil code related to the division of matrimonial property and the protection of creditors rights the applicant has filed various orders including the retention of surnames determination of residence and contact arrangements for the children and maintenance payments the applicant is also seeking the division of property and compensation for expenses the defendant has filed a counterclaim seeking similar orders the court has made rulings on the claims and counterclaim including the division of property and payment of maintenance and compensation both parties are ordered to fulfill their obligations under a credit agreement the court has granted the applicants request to postpone the payment of compensation the marriage will be dissolved due to fault on both sides the matrimonial property will be divided and both parties are ordered to pay each other compensation for various items costs are also awarded to both parties

metadata.cost: 8'935.60 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the applicant + 121.61 EUR (stamp duty) + 7'735.27 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the defendant
